segments.text: Have you had a chance to look over the contract ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've read it carefully .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And do you have any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . But the contract stipulates that I will teach 22 hours a week.Will you have thatmany classes for me right away ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , probably not . For the first two weeks you may teach 10 or 15 hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But my salary will be 1100 dollars a month.Will you pay me that much for the first month ? Because , I mean , I won't be working so many hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . That's why I didn't write the date on the contract.For the first two weeks , we will pay you according to the hours you teach.When you have 22 hours of classes , then the contract will take effect.Is that alright with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , so I don't sign the contract today . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want you to misunderstand , Miss Briggs.We are very serious about hiring you . We want you to teach for us.We usually do contracts this way because it is more convenient .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can accept that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . And your benefits will begin immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Even my health insurance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We will apply for your health insurance tomorrow.And your free membership in the club starts today if you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a few questions about the free membership .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like to know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is my membership the same as paying club members ? I mean , can I get discounts at club hotels ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . The only difference is in the restaurant and bar vouchers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are bar vouchers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Paying club members get around 300 dollars a year in restaurant vouchers.The vouchers can be used in the restaurant or the lounge.But we don't offer vouchers to employees .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But according to the contract , employees get a discount in the restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . So in a way , it is cheaper for you than for the members.You get more benefits than they do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , for now , you want me to keep a copy of the contract.But we won't sign it yet . That right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I've prepared the contract just so that you understand everything.So that you understand the terms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand.And according to the terms on the contract , I am happy to accept this job . I look forward to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm very pleased . We look forward to having you here , Miss Briggs .
segments.speaker: S1
